title: Bloomberg Markets: Jones on Active or Passive Investing

description:
Bloomberg Markets with Carol Massar and Cory Johnson. GUEST: Michael Jones Chairman/Chief Investment Officer Riverfront Investment Group Discussing "Active or Passive Investing? Or When to Use Both" from Pershing Insite 2017 in San Diego.
